title: 01. Acceptance
description: House treats a patient on death row while Dr. Cameron avoids telling a patient she has a terminal illness.

title: 02. Autopsy
description: A very brave and mature 9-year-old girl has terminal cancer, but that is not what the problem seems to be.

title: 03. Humpty Dumpty
description: Cuddy joins the team after her handyman falls off of her roof and begins to develop bizarre symptoms. Clinic Cases: African American man who objects to "minority meds."

title: 04. TB or Not TB
description: A doctor campaigns against the epidemic of TB in Africa, possibly at the risk of his own life.

title: 05. Daddy's Boy
description: The team takes care of a student with inexplicable electrical shocks, and House's parents visit.

title: 06. Spin
description: Star bicycle racer collapses, and the team must come up with a diagnosis after the patient admits to blood doping. House and Stacy continue sparring with each other. Clinic Case: Flight attendant poisons himself with gum.

title: 07. Hunting
description: After being accused of assaulting a sick man, House is forced to take on his case. However, despite the fact that he has AIDS, it's clearly not what's killing him.

title: 08. The Mistake
description: Chaos ensues after Chase's negligence leads to the death of a female patient. Now, after an inquiry from the hospital board, and a subpoena from the patient's brother, it's up to Stacey to protect Chase's career, as well as House's.

title: 09. Deception
description: A woman collapses at an off-track betting parlor in front of House, and he must battle his new boss to find her diagnosis.

title: 10. Failure to Communicate
description: When a famous writer is brought in with language difficulties, House must assist via phone while waiting for a delayed plane.

title: 11. Need to Know
description: House and the team must determine what is causing an increasingly deceitful patient's muscle flailing. Stacy makes a decision, and Cameron avoids a test.

title: 12. Distractions
description: A patient with 40% body burns and inexplicable cardiac and neurological signs is treated by the team, while House pursues disproving an old enemy's medical study.

title: 13. Skin Deep
description: The search for the cause of a supermodel's symptoms causes intense feelings among the team, as new facts are revealed. Meanwhile, House experiences increasing pain in his leg.

title: 14. Sex Kills
description: House and the team struggle to diagnose one patient in order to save another. Clinic Case: College student claims he has the hots for heifers.

title: 15. Clueless
description: House must diagnose a man who became sick and experienced difficulty breathing during sex-play but all tests keep returning normal. Wilson experiences close-up what living with House is like. Clinic case: Herpes

title: 16. Safe
description: 6 months after a teenage girl crushes her chest in a car accident and receives a heart transplant she goes into anaphylactic shock in her clean bedroom after her boyfriend almost kisses her and discovers something on her arm.

title: 17. All In
description: On a class field trip, a teacher discovers that her six-year-old student, Ian, is bleeding profusely. Dr. House thinks Ian has the same unknown disease that killed an elderly patient of his years ago.

title: 18. Sleeping Dogs Lie
description: Cameron gets mad at Foreman because Foreman steals her idea for an article. The case of the week: a lesbian woman has not slept for ten days despite taking a bottle of sleeping pills.

title: 19. House vs. God
description: House takes on a teenage faith healer, Wilson desperately wants into a poker game, and tensions escalate between Cameron and Foreman.

title: 20. Euphoria: Part 1
description: A police officer in critical condition has bizarre symptoms, and Dr. Foreman finds himself in an unpleasant situation.

title: 21. Euphoria: Part 2
description: House tries radical procedures to save Foreman's life; Foreman's father visits.

title: 22. Forever
description: A dad kisses his wife and baby goodbye before leaving for work, pukes and returns to find his wife with seizure in the bathtub and the baby under water. Foreman is back but changed.

title: 23. Who's Your Daddy?
description: House cares for a young Katrina victim, the alleged daughter of an old friend of his. He supposes she has hallucinations because of the heart, but it turns out not to be the cause. House discovers a disease that her grandfather had.

title: 24. No Reason
description: An old patient of House comes back and seeks revenge upon him in the form of gunshot.
